body: Adequate enough to enter the favourites
Highkey thought kaede was about to experience the sensation of a knife between the ribs whilst having having her freak love inside.
i see this is an absolute victory

Correction, not going to read only chapter 3. Apparently no cheating in the second chapter. I still don't know why authors think they need to add a new character to keep the series enjoyable. Sticking to sole male and sole female is ALWAYS better than creating a harem. Make multiple stories if you want to create multiple characters. Better yet, have groups of pairings. Multiple couples. I guess some people get off to cheating. Not my thing.
Chapter 1 was great. Not going to read chapter two and three due to the cheating. I hate that shit. Oh well, if I only accept chapter one as the entirety, it's pretty good.
How the fuck Kon chan became much cuter in chapter 3 than in chapter 1 and 2.Anybody??
Surprisingly good, gave the illusion that there was actually plot going down.
@I'mPissed EXACTLY, I expected the girlfriend to go full-on yandere and kill them both but oh well...

Double take re-read because i'm lifeless. Just realized how little sense this made. She will allow him to have a second girlfriend, but won't let him read porn? Tell that isn't a massive character discrepancy.

Noice, that's the fattest betrayal I have felt from one of my all-time favorites in a while. Take a beautiful sole male sole female and dirty it in such a vile way. It's nice to see that their relationship is so meaningless to each other, that some random chick can have an equal value to his lifelong friend and girlfriend, whom he can't fucking seem to choose between.

I also really liked the line "don't worry about that, I'd have done the same thing if I was in your shoes."  You think for two seconds that both characters might be extremely dirty in their sexual escapades, but still have the principles to stay true to one another, and you get shot in the fucking face. She'd have cheated on him just as fast as he did on her if she was tempted a little. Gross.
poor boi, they gon succ him dry
Poor lad I wish u best of LUCK BRO!!! 😎😂😂
Well at least the yandere is open minded so that's good.
